params.name: image_size
params.description: The size (resolution) of each image.

params.name: patch_size
params.description: The size (resolution) of each patch.

params.name: num_channels
params.description: The number of input channels.

params.name: num_channels_out
params.description: The number of output channels. If not set, it will be set to num_channels.

params.name: embed_dim
params.description: Dimensionality of patch embedding.

params.name: depths
params.description: Depth of each layer in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: num_heads
params.description: Number of attention heads in each layer of the Transformer encoder.

params.name: window_size
params.description: Size of windows.

params.name: mlp_ratio
params.description: Ratio of MLP hidden dimensionality to embedding dimensionality.

params.name: qkv_bias
params.description: Whether or not a learnable bias should be added to the queries, keys and values.

params.name: hidden_dropout_prob
params.description: The dropout probability for all fully connected layers in the embeddings and encoder.

params.name: attention_probs_dropout_prob
params.description: The dropout ratio for the attention probabilities.

params.name: drop_path_rate
params.description: Stochastic depth rate.

params.name: hidden_act
params.description: The non-linear activation function (function or string) in the encoder. If string, gelu, relu,selu and gelu_new are supported.

params.name: use_absolute_embeddings
params.description: Whether or not to add absolute position embeddings to the patch embeddings.

params.name: initializer_range
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.

params.name: layer_norm_eps
params.description: The epsilon used by the layer normalization layers.

params.name: upscale
params.description: The upscale factor for the image. 2/3/4/8 for image super resolution, 1 for denoising and compress artifactreduction

params.name: img_range
params.description: The range of the values of the input image.

params.name: resi_connection
params.description: The convolutional block to use before the residual connection in each stage.

params.name: upsampler
params.description: The reconstruction reconstruction module. Can be pixelshuffle/pixelshuffledirect/nearest+conv/None.
